page.title: 04Farming
page.content: The average acerage is {one hundred {acres}. The land is not entirely flat . There are many hillocks . This is probably one of the reasons for dairy farming as opposed to crop growing . It would be very hard to get some farm machinery up some of these hillocks easily .The fields tend to be quite small although there are some large fields . In the larger flatter fields some barley is grown . The soil in the area is not very fertile and since the land tends to be damp, dairying suits the conditions better than arable farming. Most of the farms in our area are not very modern and up to date .We stopped at some and noticed that the buildings and machinery are quite old . They did not all seem to have milking parlours and all the modern equipment which goes with them.
